org.csstudio.swt.xygraph.figures
Class Annotation

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      org.csstudio.swt.xygraph.figures.Annotation
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDataProviderListener, IAxisListener, org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure
public class Annotation
extends org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
implements IAxisListener, IDataProviderListener

Annotation Figure. Annotation could be used to indicate the information for a particular point.

Author:
Xihui Chen
